description: Automation metrics showcase section displaying 4 key business statistics with counter animations and glassmorphism styling

section_wrapper.classes: w-full max-w-6xl mx-auto px-6 py-20 md:py-32 relative z-10
section_wrapper.description: Main section container with responsive padding and max width

grid_container.classes: grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-4 md:gap-6
grid_container.description: Responsive grid: 1 column mobile, 2 columns tablet, 4 columns desktop
grid_container.behavior: Cards stack vertically on mobile, 2x2 on tablet, 1x4 on desktop

section_header.description: Optional section title and subtitle above stats

card_wrapper.classes: group relative p-6 md:p-8 rounded-xl md:rounded-2xl border border-white/10 bg-[#111113]/80 backdrop-blur-md hover:bg-white/[0.04] hover:border-white/20 transition-all duration-300
elements: metric_value (number with optional suffix like +, %, k)

icon_container.description: Optional icon at top of card using Lucide icons

metric_value.classes: text-3xl md:text-4xl lg:text-5xl font-display font-semibold tracking-tight text-white mb-2
metric_value.animation: GSAP counter animation on scroll into view

section_title.classes: text-3xl md:text-4xl lg:text-5xl font-display font-medium tracking-tight text-white

section_subtitle.classes: text-base md:text-lg text-white/50 font-light tracking-tight max-w-2xl mx-auto

metric_value.classes: text-3xl md:text-4xl lg:text-5xl font-display font-semibold tracking-tight text-white
metric_value.animation: Counter animation from 0 to target value

animation.approach: GSAP-based counter animation on scroll into view

counter_animation.behavior: Animate from 0 to target value with smooth counting
counter_animation.implementation_note: Use gsap.to() with onUpdate to set displayed value

card_fade_in.description: Staggered fade-in for each stat card on page load

translation_keys.example: Real results from automation and custom software

semantic_html.section_tag: Use <section> with optional id='stats' or aria-labelledby
semantic_html.heading: Use <h2> for section title if provided
semantic_html.metric_structure: Use <div> with role='group' or semantic <figure> for each stat
semantic_html.metric_value: Use <span> or <div> with aria-label for screen readers

aria_considerations: Add aria-label to animated numbers to announce final value
Ensure icon-only elements have aria-label or are decorative (aria-hidden='true')
Use aria-live='polite' during counter animation for screen readers (optional)

keyboard_navigation.requirement: Cards are non-interactive, so no keyboard focus needed
keyboard_navigation.note: If cards become clickable in future, add tabindex and focus states

color_contrast.metric_value: White text on dark background exceeds WCAG AA
color_contrast.border: white/10 border provides subtle visual separation

metric_interface.typescript: interface Metric { value: number; suffix?: string; label: string; description?: string; icon?: string; }

state_management.counter_refs: useRef array for each stat counter element
state_management.animated_values: useState for current displayed values (if needed)

gsap_setup.scroll_trigger: Trigger animation when section enters viewport
gsap_setup.counter_logic: Use gsap.to() with custom object property and onUpdate callback

number_formatting.description: Format numbers with commas and suffixes

glassmorphism_treatment.background: bg-[#111113]/80 with backdrop-blur-md for frosted glass effect

layout: Section uses max-w-6xl container with responsive padding (py-20 md:py-32)
Stats arranged in responsive grid (1 col mobile, 2 col tablet, 4 col desktop)
Grid gap is gap-4 on mobile, gap-6 on desktop
stat_cards: Each card has glassmorphism styling (bg-[#111113]/80 backdrop-blur-md)
Hover effects work: bg-white/[0.04] and border-white/20
Each card contains: metric value, metric label, optional description, optional icon
typography: Metric values use font-display with appropriate sizing (text-3xl to text-5xl)
Metric labels use text-white/60 with font-light
All text has tracking-tight for tighter letter spacing
animations: Cards fade in with staggered delays (0.1s, 0.2s, 0.3s, 0.4s)
Numbers animate from 0 to target value using GSAP counter animation
Counter animation triggers when section enters viewport (ScrollTrigger)
Animation duration is 1.5-2 seconds with smooth easing
translations: Section title and subtitle are optional and translated
Each metric has translated label and optional description
accessibility: Animated numbers have aria-label with final value
Icons are either labeled or decorative (aria-hidden)
Color contrast meets WCAG AA standards
responsive: Layout adapts correctly at all breakpoints (mobile, tablet, desktop)
Cards remain readable and well-proportioned at all sizes
technical: GSAP and ScrollTrigger are properly imported and registered

counter_animation_example.code_pattern: useGSAP(() => { const counters = [refs]; counters.forEach((counter, i) => { gsap.to(counter.current, { textContent: targetValue, duration: 2, ease: 'power2.out', snap: { textContent: 1 }, scrollTrigger: { trigger: sectionRef.current, start: 'top 80%' } }); }); }, []);

number_formatting.description: Consider formatting numbers with commas during animation
number_formatting.implementation: Use onUpdate callback to format textContent with toLocaleString()

rtl_support.description: Component should work with both English (LTR) and Hebrew (RTL)
rtl_support.consideration: Number formatting and icon positioning may need RTL adjustments
rtl_support.implementation: Use useLocale() from next-intl and apply conditional classes for RTL

performance.description: GSAP animations are performant, but avoid unnecessary re-renders
performance.recommendation: Use refs for DOM manipulation, not state updates during animation
